name: imagefttext
purpose: Write text to the image using fonts using FreeType 2

return.description:
This function returns an array defining the four points of the box, starting in the lower left and moving counter-clockwise:
   
    
     
      
       0
       lower left x-coordinate
      
      
       1
       lower left y-coordinate
      
      
       2
       lower right x-coordinate
      
      
       3
       lower right y-coordinate
      
      
       4
       upper right x-coordinate
      
      
       5
       upper right y-coordinate
      
      
       6
       upper left x-coordinate
      
      
       7
       upper left y-coordinate

notes.description: This function requires GD 2.0.1 or later (2.0.28 or later is recommended).

This function is only available if
PHP is compiled with freetype support (--with-freetype-dir=DIR)
